Aktivität Dear Students, Welcome to the seminar "Innovation ... auswählen
This semester the seminar takes place
as well as in form of classroom events .
We give our best to equippe you

in this modified way with econometric and empirical tools
that are applied in the field of innovation, productivity and firm 
performance and the application and implementation with the software R.

Usually, student participation in class is key to the course that it is 
characterized by a lot of discussions and interactions in classroom
organize as well virtuell presentations and discussions rounds with

online feedback on your 
empirical work.

During this semester, successfully completing
 the course includes remarkable self study work from your side with 
respect to the methodological background as well as the impelemtations 
in R. In case of any questions, comments or suggestions do not hesitate to contact us.
We look forward to the semester with you!
In case you want to participate please send an email for registration to a.cullmann@tu-berlin.de
The Seminar starts in the second week. We discuss the time schedule in the first meeting. There will be a first kick off meeting online via Zoom (25.04.2024, 12:00-13:30)
